name: Survive Neon
description:
This game requires a Vive.

This is an early prototype build I made for Survive Neon. I spent a few months polishing the game and improving the enemies after this release, however, I ended up losing all of that work because my backups were not running and I deleted the local data. This build is all that's left of the game.

I don't think I can put myself through remaking the game. I thought some people would enjoy this quick VR demo.

The amazing music is by Ben Burnes.

For updates on my latest projects, follow me on Twitter.
